Method Detail

getUnoccupiedGridPoint

public Point getUnoccupiedGridPoint()
This method determines whether there is a spawnpoint which is not occupied. If there is one, it will return the PointF otherwise it will return null, when all spawnPoints are occupied.

Returns:
a pointF for spawning or null, if everything is occupied.
